name: ExTiX - The Ultimate Linux System
short_description:
Version 15.2 (two versions - both built 150417) of ExTiX 64 bit are based on Debian/Ubuntu. The original system includes the Desktop Environment Unity (Ubuntu). In ExTiX I have removed Unity and installed KDE 4.14.6 together with KDE Frameworks 5.9.0 respective LXQt 0.9.0 instead. 

PROGRAM content etc (both versions)
Among many other programs LibreOffice, Thunderbird, GParted, Google Chrome, Brasero, SMPlayer, Gimp, Flash and win32 codecs. In addition Java and all necessary additions in order to install programs from source. Google Chrome for Netflix and BlueGriffon as Web Editor. All programs (in both versions) have been updated to the latest available stable version as of April 17, 2015.

PASSWORDS
The password for root is root. You can only log in to KDE/LXQt as root.

KERNELS
3.19.0-14-exton is used in both versions. (Kernel.org's 3.19.3).

You can run ExTiX from RAM and/or with persistence when running from a USB stick.
summary: Based on Debian/Ubuntu with KDE/LXQt and kernel 3.19.0-14-exton
